pages.text: $(bred)Digger Zombie$() spends three days a week getting his excavation permits in order.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)40$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It can $(l)dig to bypass your defenses$() and dig out when close to its target.When lost pickaxe, its speed will turn $(l)Little Slow$() and damage turn $(l)Low$().$(br)$(bpurple)Weakness$() : $(bgreen)Potato Mine$(), $(bgreen)Magnet Shroom$() ...
